Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Mâ€™dzina la Mulungu, Mwini Chifundo ndi Mwini Chisoni Chosatha
Mwini Chifundo ndi Mwini Chisoni Chosatha
Inu nokha tikulambirani ndipo ndi kwa Inu nokha kumene timapempha chithandizo
Njira ya iwo amene mwawakonda osati ya iwo amene adalandira mkwiyo wanu kapena anasokera
